TopicTitle: RavenWest Jetpacks: New Orbital Space Jetpack T-18!!

Articles.Content:
![O5xw6rj.png](http://i.imgur.com/O5xw6rj.png)

\*This message is approved by Barack O' kerman.\*

[**Download it today!!!**](https://www.dropbox.com/s/n3xolve9qdqdi0x/RavenWest%20T-17%20Jetpack.craft?dl=0)

**Has over 1000 meters per second of Delta-V!!!**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/ixk9r)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/rAZrp)

 Alternative Monopropellant download [here.](https://www.dropbox.com/s/o9tsk6aj1ocxp8x/RavenWest%20T-17%20Variant%20JetPack.craft?dl=0)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/7g5rz)

 T-18 Space Construct can be downloaded [here.](https://www.dropbox.com/s/11d9h81erh69my0/RavenWest%20T-18%20Space%20Construct.craft?dl=0)

**Flight Instrucions (For Dummies Guide)**

1. [\*=center]Put a kerbal on the seat  
[\*=center]Stage to separate from lander can.  
[\*=center]Have fun flying it around KSC.  
[\*=center]\*Warning TWR is = 1.27, if your falling at around 50 meters per second, you should full throttle at 100 meters per second and that should slow you down. If not, an emergency para-shoes... erm I mean parachute (One that actually works) to save the day. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/bH_07N0Po1g?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Thank you for viewing.**

Ohh nice selection, the good ole Bell Rocket Belt. I was viewing that one but I was like nope already been done. So I went with a more modern type jetpack with with center thrust. New idea now ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) add fins to it to make it the jetpack with wings.

>

HAHAHA YESS!!

Glad you like it. Im making a very short video for youtube to demonstrate it. Since I was recording and didn't want to crash, I didn't want to do anything challenging like the ksc tunnel, VAB hole in the helipad and what not. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Video is up Check it out ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Watch it in 720 or 1080 HD <-- Because why not?

Monopropellant is a bit inefficient in atmosphere but I can give it a shot ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif). I had a challenge called the GreenPower Electric Challenge in which uses ions but now it is cancelled. Ions got no isp in atmosphere.

Variant pack is up and running for all you monopropellant fans out there. Delta-V is the same, TWR at full fuel is 1.01 ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) that is needed to get the same Delta-V, less acrobatic, more speed, high end KSC viewing: 3000 Meters +. You can download it NOW on the main page under the RavenWest T-17 Image Album ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) Enjoy.
